meanings.definition: A female demon believed to have sexual intercourse with sleeping men.
meanings.sent1: Legends tell of succubas who visit men in their dreams.
meanings.sent2: The succubas in folklore are said to seduce men at night.
meanings.sent3: The idea of succubas can make for spooky bedtime stories.
meanings.sent4: She was like a succubas, luring him into a dreamy trance.
meanings.sent5: Beware the succubas, for they prey on unsuspecting souls.

meanings.definition: A seductive or sexually attractive woman.
meanings.sent1: The actress played the role of a succubas in the movie.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't resist the charm of the mysterious succubas.
meanings.sent3: She entered the room like a succubas, turning heads with her allure.
meanings.sent4: Her beauty was so captivating, she was like a succubas in human form.
meanings.sent5: The party was full of succubas, each vying for attention.
